title: Bonus: Robert Evans Wrote A Novel: Here's Chapter 1
itunes:title: Bonus: Robert Evans Wrote A Novel: Here's Chapter 1
description:
In 2017 and 2018 Robert wrote a science fiction novel, set twenty years after a Civil War destroyed the United States. As an insurrection month present, you can listen to chapter 1 now.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
